meanings.definition: An ancient town in Paphlagonia, now in modern-day Turkey.
meanings.english_definition: An ancient town in Paphlagonia, located in modern-day Turkey. Its exact location is uncertain.

examples.sentence: Geoprumnon was mentioned by several ancient historians.
examples.translation: ゲオプルムノンは古代の歴史家によって言及されました。

etymology.value: From Ancient Greek Γεώπρυμνον (Geṓprumnon). The etymology of the name itself is uncertain.

usage_notes.explanation: Geoprumnon is primarily known from historical texts and archaeological discussions. It is not a commonly used word.

readability_explanation.text: This word is highly specialized and would only appear in historical or archaeological contexts. It is not part of general vocabulary.
